issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
It appears that the table view in 'Base UI' tab is not rendering in Kitchen Sink right now.  I narrowed down the commit ranges that could have possibly caused this:

OK: eec24cfaff6156a79fc7a91fc92a1e651f5718cd
NOT OK: 2888f723eb091d8e6dc67def013dca0789a9dd2c

This must be resolved immediately. The bug may be intermittent; please confirm the githashes which demonstrate the issue. You may need to clean the project and reinstall the app after checking out each hash.
fields.summary: 'Base UI' tab not rendering in KS

comments.body: Could not reproduce with iPad 1 4.3.5, iPad 2, 4.3.5, iPod touch 3rd gen 4.0.2 with SDK 1.8.0.v20110922234950. Will keep an eye open for this on subsequent KS passes.
